SummaryEnglish: BOOMi Bear, along with his best friends, play and learn about friendship, positivity and imagination in a virtual reality game universe.

1.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi, Mia, Mac and their robot dog, BiBop must save all the toys before Mega Bug finds them all./BOOMi, Mia, Mac and BIBop must save the bakset ball toy from Mega Bug.

2.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi, Mia, Mac and BIBop are transported to the Undersea Maze, where they must save the crystal ball from Mega Bug. They must learn to listen to each other in order to win back the toy in this round.

3.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi, Mia, Mac and BIBop are transported to the Dinosaur world in order to save the Dinosaur toy.

4.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi, Mia, Mac and BIBop are transported to a Hockey arena. Mega Bug tries to get BOOMi's team to play against the rules and BOOMi ends up in the penalty box.

5.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi, Mia, Mac and BIBop are transported to a Hospital to retrieve the Doctor's toy back before Mega Bug gets it. Mac has a cold and doesnâ€™t want to take his medicine.

6.TitleEnglish: Journey to Outer Space/Super Heroes vs Robosaurus Rex
6.SummaryEnglish: After seeing the 'Supermoon' from BOOMi's bedroom window, BOOMi, Mia, Mac and BiBop are transported to a Super Spaceship and become astronauts.

7.SummaryEnglish: The Star HQ alarm goes off while BOOMi, Mia and Mac are playing games and the Team are transported to a Helicopter Race.

8.SummaryEnglish: Mia reads an ancient history book on how to defeat opponents. BOOMi and Mac don't think that ancient text books will helop them, until Mia uses her knowledge to help defeat Mega Bug to rescue the Imperial Emporer.

9.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi, Mia and Mac use building blocks to build a castle, but BOOMi tries to interfere with Mac's plan. When they enter the Star World game, BOOMi is too bossy and won't listen to his friends' ideas.

10.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi and his friends are sent to play golf in the Star World game. Mia claims that she knows how to play golf and tells everyone to hit the ball their hardest.

11.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi, Mia, Mac and Bibop are sent to the Star World Game to play baseball. They must learn to work together in order to beat a very aggressive team of Light Bulb Baseball Players.

12.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi, Mia, Mac and Bibop prepare to go on a mountain hike, but Mia overprepares and packs too much stuff./BOOMi, Mia, Mac and Bibop are sent to the Star World Game to save a Greek Princess from Mega Bug's meddling.

13.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi and his friends must help a Pengiun Father protect his egg./BOOMi and his friends are sent to a bowling alley in space.

14.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi and his friends are sent on a Pirate Treasure Hunt. When Mega Bug sends Captain Hippo's team to try and find the treasure first, BOOMi must use all his might to defeat them.

15.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi beats Mac in a game and Mac complains that BOOMi always has to win. When the team travel to the Star World Game, they must complete in a Super Triathlon.

16.TitleEnglish: A Fantasyland of Four Seasons/Circus of the Stars
16.SummaryEnglish: BOOMI is late meeting his friends and when they are upset, he dismisses it as no big deal.

17.SummaryEnglish: BOOMi creates a modified delivery helicopter, but it fails. BOOMi and the Team are sent to a science lab where two Doctors invented a Robot. The robot was stolen and used to make people work.
